properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name used for the Network.

properties.name: account_href
properties.description: (Required) HREF for the Account associated with the Network.
<hr/>

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) The description for the Network.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional) A dictionary of user defined key/value pairs to associate with this resource.

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: » Attributes

properties.name: href
properties.description: The HREF to reference this Network.
The Pureport Guide,
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name for the connection

properties.name: location_href
properties.description: (Required) HREF for the Pureport Location to attach the connection.

properties.name: network_href
properties.description: (Required) HREF for the network to associate the connection.

properties.name: speed
properties.description: (Required) The maximum QoS for this connection. Valid values are 50, 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 1000, 10000 in Mbps.

properties.name: aws_account_id
properties.description: (Required) Your AWS Account ID.

properties.name: aws_region
properties.description: (Required) The AWS region to create your connection.
<hr/>

properties.description: (Optional) The description for the connection.

properties.name: list description
properties.description: gateways - List of cloud gateways and their configurations.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the cloud gateway.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the cloud gateway.

properties.name: availability_domain
properties.description: The availability domain of the cloud gateway. The valid values are PRIMARY, SECONDARY.

properties.name: customer_asn
properties.description: The customer ASN used for BGP Peering.

properties.name: customer_ip
properties.description: The assigned IP address to the customer side of the BGP Config.

properties.name: pureport_asn
properties.description: The Pureport ASN used for BGP Peering.

properties.name: pureport_ip
properties.description: The assigned IP address to the Pureport side of the BGP Config.

properties.name: bgp_password
properties.description: The autogenerated BGP password used for authentication.

properties.name: peering_subnet
properties.description: The BGP Config subnet assigned to establish BGP peering.

properties.name: public_nat_ip
properties.description: The public facing IP Address for NAT used by this connection.

properties.name: remote_id
properties.description: The ID of the AWS Direct Connect Connection.

properties.name: vlan
properties.description: The VLAN id for the connection to cloud services.
